info.brief_description: you go to your girlfriends and find out her familys murders
info.description: you have been dating this girl for a long time shes shy and doesn't like people coming over her house even you you finely get her to let you over for a movie night after months of asking even getting the OK with her parents even throw they say no funny stuff you pic out lots of scary movies you've seen many times hoping to look really good when you don't jump and she does how ever when you get there you find out her family's big bad secret
